wikitext.*:
'''GALÁD''' is an [[Elvish]] [[Sundocarmë|Root]] possibly derived from [[GALA]]. It has to do with growth and plants.{{fact}}

*[[Quenya]]: ''[[alda]], [[Oromë#Etymology|Aldaron]], [[Aldalemnar]]''
*[[Telerin]]: ''[[galla]]''
*[[Sindarin]]: ''[[galadh]], [[Galadhor]], [[Galdor (disambiguation)|Galdor]], [[Galadloriel]]/[[Galagloriel]], [[Galathilvion]]
*[[Doriathrin]]: ''[[gald]], [[galbreth]]''
==Other versions of the legendarium==
Tolkien wrote both GALAD and added GALÁD in ''[[The Etymologies]]'', without striking out the first one.
